info.title: Amazon EC2 Virtual Private Gateways (Amazon VPC) API
info.description: The API for management Virtual Private Gateways (Amazon VPC)

get.summary: Attaches a virtual private gateway to a VPC.
get.description: Attaches a virtual private gateway to a VPC.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: VpnGatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway.

parameters.name: AvailabilityZone
parameters.description: The Availability Zone for the virtual private gateway.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of VPN connection this virtual private gateway supports.

get.summary: Deletes the specified virtual private gateway.
get.description: Deletes the specified virtual private gateway.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: VpnGatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway.

get.summary: Describes one or more of your virtual private gateways.
get.description: Describes one or more of your virtual private gateways.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: VpnGatewayId.N
parameters.description: One or more virtual private gateway IDs.

get.summary: Detaches a virtual private gateway from a VPC.
get.description: Detaches a virtual private gateway from a VPC.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: VpnGatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway.
